formulas.name: TaskDescription
formulas.expression: "Contact " + {!$User.FirstName} + " " + {!$User.LastName} + " on Customer " + {!Get_Case.Account.Name} + " have finished onboarding. Please review the data and proceed by submitting the quote for approval."

formulas.name: TaskSubject
formulas.expression: "Specified Business Internet Quote ready to be reviewed"

fields.name: ClosedScreenText2
fields.fieldText: The criteria for running the flow has not been met.

fields.name: AreYouSureText
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to delete lines?

fields.name: FrameworkCompletionText
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to complete the onboarding? The requested connections will be validated and activated.

fields.name: SpecifiedCompletionText
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to complete the onboarding? Your account manager will be notified and you will receieve an offer as soon as possible
